projects.name: Modelling Audience Interactions on Social Media
projects.summary: To develop an AI system that collects, stores, processes, and analyzes various social media contents. Also, to utilize the developed tool in computational social science studies.

projects.name: Telling Good Stories
projects.summary: Collect, store, process, and analyze tweets relevant to narratives of compassion and support during challenging times such as the Covid-19 pandemic.

projects.name: DIIL
projects.summary: Build a scalable online social media analysis platform for monitoring public opinion over topics of interest, e.g., Brexit, Scottish referendum, and Covid-19 pandemic.

projects.name: Huawei
projects.summary: To build an internal platform to monitor the public reviews on Huawei's products online.

projects.name: Yemen Crisis, UN
projects.summary: Build a platform for collecting tweets about and from Yemen in Arabic to identify the locations and groups that are the most in-need so that the UN can provide immediate help.
